title: Testing - While Loop IO
instructions: Just run the default program to check for expected behaviour.
starter:
loop_guard = input("Run loop? ")
while loop_guard == "y":
    print("OK, looping")
    loop_guard = input("Run loop again? ")
print("Done looping!")

files./main.py:
